SD.1 StructureDefinition-omh-step-count

source file: source/pages/_includes/omh-step-count-intro.md

Open mHeallth Step Count Schema represents represents number of steps. See Open mHealth Schemas. The LOINC code refers to Number of steps in unspecified time Pedometer, “url”: “http://purl.bioontology.org/ontology/LNC/55423-8”

Scope and Usage

scope and usage text here….

Example

{  
  "ResourceType":"OMHStepCount",
   "id":"example-1",
   "omhHeader":{  
      "ResourceType":"OmhHeader",
      "id":"example-1",
      "dataPointId":"12341567",
      "creationDateTime":"2018-04-T24:13:51Z",
      "schemaId":{  
         "namespace":"omh",
         "name":"step-count",
         "version":"1.0"
      },
      "acquisitionProvenance":{  
         "sourceName":"Jawbone UP API>",
         "sourceDataPointId":"123456",
         "sourceCreationDateTime":"2018-04-24T17:13:50Z",
         "modificationDateTime":"2018-04-24T17:13:51Z",
         "modality":"sensed"
      },
      "userId":"user123456"
   },
   "stepCount":7939,
   "effectiveTimeFrame":{  
      "start":"2018-04-17T00:00:00Z",
      "end":"2018-04-24T00:00:00Z"
    },
   "descriptiveStatistic":"maximum",
   "descriptiveStatisticDenominator":"d"
}

SD.1.1 Formal Views of Profile Content

Description of Profiles, Differentials, and Snapshots.

The official URL for this profile is: http://www.fhir.org/guides/mfhir/StructureDefinition/omh-step-count

Published on Wed Apr 11 00:00:00 PDT 2018 as a draft by Health eData Inc.

This profile builds on Element

Summary

Mandatory: 0 element (3 nested mandatory elements)

Structures

This structure refers to these other structures:

  • http://www.fhir.org/guides/mfhir/StructureDefinition/omh-header

Differential View

NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
OmhStepCount
omhHeader 1..1OMHHeader
stepCount 1..1decimal
effectiveTimeFrame 1..1Period
descriptiveStatistic 0..1codeBinding: StatisticsCode (required)
descriptiveStatisticDenominator 0..1codeBinding: descriptive-statistic-denominator (required)

SD.1.2 Mappings

Below are mappings for this model. These mappings are informative and are provided to help implementers of this specification understand the content and use it correctly.

Mappings for OMH Step Count Schema (https://github.com/openmhealth/schemas/blob/master/schema/omh/atep-count-1.0.json)
OMHStepCount
OmhStepCountOMH Step Count Schema
   omhHeadersee OmhHeader Mapping tables
   stepCountproperties.step_count
   effectiveTimeFrameproperties.effective_time_frame
   descriptiveStatisticproperties.descriptive_statistic
   descriptiveStatisticDenominatorproperties.descriptive_statistic_denominator
Mappings for FHIR Observation Profile (http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/observation.html)
OMHStepCount
OmhStepCountObservation resource with Observation.code = LOINC 55423-8 (Number of steps in unspecified time Pedometer)
   omhHeadersee OmhHeader Mapping tables
   stepCountRule1: IF no descriptiveStatistic (descriptiveStatistic.empty()) Observation.valueQuantity.value ELSE Observation.component.valueQuantity.value
   effectiveTimeFrameObservation.effectivePeriod
   descriptiveStatisticObservation.component.code
   descriptiveStatisticDenominatorObservation.component.valueQuantity.unit|code (ConceptMap based on code and descriptiveStatisticDenominator)
